Macros | Functions
sbl_utils_ddr_config.h File Reference
SBL DDR Configuration Utilities

This file contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDAxx DDR configuration. This is taken from gel and follows the Gel coding guidelines which are different from starterware coding guidelines. More...

Detailed Description

This file contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDAxx DDR configuration. This is taken from gel and follows the Gel coding guidelines which are different from starterware coding guidelines.
